name: Apollo
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated

name: Minotaur
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level

name: Artemis
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

name: Atlas
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may build a dome at any level

name: Demeter
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space

name: Hephaestus
descriptionStrategy: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block

name: Prometheus
descriptionStrategy: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving

name: Athena
descriptionStrategy: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn

name: Pan
descriptionStrategy: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels
